Text:
Virus Found in this torrent:

Trojan Virus (android)
Trojan Name: Android.Adrd
Virus Infection: Android.Adrd is a Trojan horse that steals information from Android devices. 

File Source - sms bomber_1.6.apk

On here it does not shows sms bomber_1.6.apk, however when you download torrent, their is sms bomber_1.6.apk, which is a virus! When installed on android it steals any stored information - BEWARE:


*All other applications work great though!
